fields.name: MaximumPlatformSoftwareVersion
fields.description: The maximum software version of the platform where this packet core version can be deployed.

fields.name: MinimumPlatformSoftwareVersion
fields.description: The minimum software version of the platform where this packet core version can be deployed.

fields.name: ObsoleteVersion
fields.description: Indicates whether this version is obsoleted for this platform.

fields.name: PlatformType
fields.description: The platform type where this version can be deployed.

fields.name: RecommendedVersion
fields.description: Indicates whether this is the recommended version for this platform.

fields.name: VersionState
fields.description: The state of this packet core control plane version on this platform.
